name: There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight
storyline:
In short, your mission is to save the world, same as always. This time, there's a madman threatening the world with sophisticated satellite technology that can strike anywhere at any time, including wiping out other satellites. So it's up to you to ferret out his identity and bring him to justice - or take him out entirely.

Assisting you in this endeavor is the usual team - your experienced partner in the field, Virginia, and our resident tech wizard, Hatcher. But the success or failure of this mission rests on your shoulders and yours alone. This is a single-player game, after all.
summary: Step into the shoes of the suave secret agent Franklin Benjamin in this single-player spy thriller interactive novel. Drive fast cars, seduce beautiful women, and do whatever it takes to save the day against impossible odds. Because there's always a madman, and you're the best agent we've got!
